phrasetype.name: login
phrasetype.title: Login
phrasetype.phrase:
There is an error in your username and or password.
Please Go Back and Enter the currect details.
If you have forgoten your password click here!
You Have Been Logged Out Succefully

If you have forgotten your username or your password this form will help you restoring them .. all you need to do is putting your email below then press the submit button and wait for the message .. it will contain your information and a note tells you how to request password restore mail.

welcome $u[username],
To complete the phase of resetting your account password at $options[sitetitle], you will need to go to the URL below in your web browser.
$options[address]/member.php?action=activate&do=password&userid=$u[userid]&code=$randomcode
Thank you, $options[sitetitle] administrators
The Email You entered is not currect ..No members in this forum is signed with this email

The restore message has been sent .. it will be in your email within next 24 hours..
fallow the instructions to reset your password .. and the message will contain your username

phrasetype.name: newpost
phrasetype.title: New posting
phrasetype.phrase:
There is an error in adding your post
please make sure that all the required fields are filled and make sure of the thread url.

Thank you, your reply has been posted.
You will now be redirected to your post.

The number of letters on your post are less than the minimum post chars which is 5 chars ..
Please Go Back And rewrite your post with at least five chars...
Click here to add or edit files attached to this message
Yes, post a poll with this thread
Close this thread after you submit your message
Stick this thread after you submit your message
Your Thread Has benn submited and you will be redirected to your thread....

Your Thread Has benn submited ...
you Choosed to add poll ,, you will be redirected to add poll page..
You Cant Add Thread To This Forum
You Cant Add post To This Forum ,,
You have selected no forum to post a new thread in ..

There is no subject for this thread
please go back and fill the subject field
This thread is closed for posting ,, you cant post in closed thread
You Dont have permission to add posts ,,

To delete this post check the box to the left then click delete post to the right .
note : this action can not be un done ,, and if it was the first post of a thread that will cause the deletion of the all thread.

The post was not deleted ,,
make sure the post is exist and it is the post you want delete
if you were sure of that please call the administrators and notfy them about the error .
The thread was successfully deleted and you will be redirected to the thread's forum .
post successfully deleted and you will be redirected to the thread.

Delete confirmation box was not checked ,,
if you are sure you want delete this post you must go back . check the box then click delete post,
Your post has been succeffully edited and you will be redirected to the thread.
there is an error and your post was not edited ,, make sure the post is exist and all the required fields are filled ,, if you sow the error message again please notify the administrator about this

welcome $userinfo[username],
$post[username] has just replied to a thread which you have subscribed to at $options[sitetitle]. This thread is titled $post[threadtitle].
Here is an excerpt of the message: -- $post[postcut] --
To view the thread, you can go to the following URL: $options[address]/showthread.php?action=newpost&tid=$post[threadid]
There may also be other replies to this thread but you will not receive anymore notifications until you visit the board again.
Thank you, $options[sitetitle] administrators
------------------------------------------ Unsubscription Information:
If you would not like to receive any more notifications of replies to this thread, visit the following URL in your browser: $options[address]/usercp.php?action=removesubscription&tid=$post[threadid]
------------------------------------------

phrasetype.name: register
phrasetype.title: Register
phrasetype.phrase: Error ,, our Records Says that you are already registered ,, if not please log out before registering.
You have entered different string ,, please enter the same string in the verification image.
Please enter a valid email address. You can choose to hide it below in the preferences section.
Please enter the text contained within the image in to the textbox below it. This process is used to prevent automated signups.
Optional Information All information will be viewable by other $options[sitetitle] members.
You have Not Agreed On the Forum rules.
I have read, and agree to abide by the Forums rules.

Registration to this forum is free! We do insist that you abide by the rules and policies detailed below. If you agree to the terms, please check the 'I agree' checkbox and press the 'Register' button below. If you would like to cancel the registration, click here to return to the forums index.

Although the administrators and moderators of Forums will attempt to keep all objectionable messages off this forum, it is impossible for us to review all messages. All messages express the views of the author, and neither the owners of Forums, nor Jelsoft Enterprises Ltd. (developers of vBulletin) will be held responsible for the content of any message.

By agreeing to these rules, you warrant that you will not post any messages that are obscene, vulgar, sexually-oriented, hateful, threatening, or otherwise violative of any laws.

The owners of Forums reserve the right to remove, edit, move or close any thread for any reason.
Optional signature you may use to appear at bottom of your posts.
There Was An error during registeration ,, please check the fields and fill them currectly

You have Completed your registeration..
$options[require_email_verify] Click here to go where you have been before registeration..
Click here to go main page..

This forum requires email verification before you can be a normal user ..
You have recived a confirmation email .. Please Fallow the instructions to complete your registeration.
The Email You entered is already user by another member
The UserName You entered is already user by another member
If you select your birthday then other forum members will be able to see your birthday on the forum calendar and in your profile. Adding your year of birth is also optional.
You make pick an avatar that appears beneath your name on your posts
The administrators disabled the registeration .. please come back on another time.

welcome $u[username],
To complete the registration process on $options[sitetitle], you will need to go to the URL below in your web browser.
$options[address]/member.php?action=activate&userid=$u[userid]&code=$randomcode
Thank you, $options[sitetitle] administrators
Using this option will allow the forum to mail you whenever now action happens like new reply on your thread or reciving new pm.
Enabling this option allows you to use color, font, special codes and you can also use smilies to have them inserted into your posts.

If you want proceed with this change, Please Click on the link below or copy and paste the link on your browser.
$options[address]/member.php?action=activate&do=email&userid=$local[userid]&code=$randomcode

phrasetype.name: admincp
phrasetype.title: Admin Control Panel
phrasetype.phrase: Welcome To ArBB Admin Control Panel

Settings To Edit
Select the settings type you want to edit and click edit settings button
Your Forums Setting Has Been Successfully Updated.
View Your Forums Using This style.
The Selected style variables has been updated successfully
Below you may add CSS To be included with this style.
The selected style is the default style .. and the default style could not be deleted.. if you want delete this style set another style as default style then delete this style ..

when you confirm this action all the templates setted for this style will be deleted and all style information will be deleted
Thia action couldn't be undone.
Are you sure you want delete the style
The selected style was successfully deleted ..
The Default language has been successfully setted.
The selected language is the default language .. and the default language could not be deleted.. if you want delete this language set another language as default language then delete this language ..
Are You sure you want delete the language

When you delete a language all the phrases setted for this language will be deleted
This work couldn't be undone.
The selected language was successfully deleted.
The selected Phrase Was Updated successfully..

Note : This action can not be un done ..

If no, will act as a category.

This will update forum counters .. forum threads, posts, last post information

When You Update Threads .. thread poster information will be updated and thread counters will be updated.
This will update users posts counter for each user ..
